alert.note: Alert for Marion (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 27 at 1:23AM EDT until June 27 at 6:00AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 AM EDT FOR SOUTHERN FLORENCE...SOUTHERN MARION AND NORTHERN WILLIAMSBURG COUNTIES... At 122 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near New Hope to near Alcolu, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Lake City, Kingstree, Timmonsville, Johnsonville, Pamplico, Cades, Poston, Indiantown, Gresham, Hebron, New Hope, Salters, Sardis, Hyman, Hannah, Effingham, Friendfield, Kingsburg, Scranton and Coward. An automated weather station in Olanta recently reported a wind gust of 40 mph. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
